# CloudedDeals

> Every deal from every Las Vegas dispensary, updated daily at 8 AM.

CloudedDeals is a free cannabis deal comparison platform covering 27+ licensed Las Vegas dispensaries. We scrape dispensary menus every morning, classify products, score deals, and present the best prices in one place. No account required.

## What We Cover

- **27+ licensed dispensaries** across the Las Vegas Strip, Downtown, and local neighborhoods
- **5 product categories**: flower, vapes, edibles, concentrates, and pre-rolls
- **Daily price updates** at 8 AM Pacific from live dispensary menus
- **Deal scoring** (0-100) based on price vs. market average

## Key Pages

- [All Las Vegas Dispensary Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/las-vegas-dispensary-deals): Every deal from every dispensary, filterable and sortable
- [Strip Dispensary Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/strip-dispensary-deals): Deals from dispensaries near the Las Vegas Strip
- [Downtown Dispensary Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/downtown-dispensary-deals): Deals from Downtown Las Vegas dispensaries near Fremont Street
- [Local Dispensary Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/local-dispensary-deals): Off-strip dispensary deals in Henderson, NLV & beyond
- [Blog](https://cloudeddeals.com/blog): Guides and comparisons for Las Vegas cannabis shopping
- [Flower Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/flower): Cannabis flower deals and prices
- [Vape Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/vapes): Vape cartridge and pod deals
- [Edible Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/edibles): Edible and gummy deals
- [Concentrate Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/concentrates): Wax, shatter, and live resin deals
- [Pre-Roll Deals](https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/prerolls): Pre-roll and joint deals
- [Browse by Dispensary](https://cloudeddeals.com/browse): See all 27+ dispensaries

## Top Dispensaries We Track

- [Planet 13](https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/planet13): World's largest dispensary, on the Strip
- [Curaleaf Strip](https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/curaleaf-strip): Major chain dispensary on Las Vegas Blvd
- [The Dispensary - Gibson](https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/td-gibson): Premium local dispensary in Henderson
- [Medizin](https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/medizin): Popular dispensary near the airport
- [The Grove](https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/the-grove): Well-known dispensary with competitive deals
- [Oasis](https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/oasis): Long-running Las Vegas dispensary
